{{cpp/utility/optional/title|operator bool | has_value}}
{{cpp/utility/optional/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | since=c++17| 1=
constexpr explicit operator bool() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl | since=c++17| 1=
constexpr bool has_value() const noexcept;
}}

{{dcl end}}

Checks whether {{c|*this}} contains a value.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if {{c|*this}} contains a value, {{c|false}} if {{c|*this}} does not contain a value.

===Example===
{{example|code=
#include &lt;optional&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha;
    
    std::optional&lt;int&gt; opt;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; opt.has_value() &lt;&lt; '\n';
 
    opt = 43;
    if (opt)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "value set to " &lt;&lt; opt.value() &lt;&lt; '\n';
    else
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "value not set\n";
        
    opt.reset();
    if (opt.has_value())
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "value still set to " &lt;&lt; opt.value() &lt;&lt; '\n';
    else
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "value no longer set\n";
}
|output=
false
value set to 43
value no longer set
}}
